scripts.start: lerna run start --scope @<%= projectName %>/app-runtime --scope @<%= projectName %>/article-team --scope @<%= projectName %>/user-team --parallel
scripts.build: lerna run build --scope @<%= projectName %>/app-runtime --scope @<%= projectName %>/article-team --scope @<%= projectName %>/user-team --parallel
scripts.demo: lerna run demo --scope @<%= projectName %>/app-runtime --scope @<%= projectName %>/article-team --scope @<%= projectName %>/user-team --parallel
